Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
AccumulatorA This class represents Accumulator A register
AccumulatorB This class represents Accumulator B register
AccumulatorD This class represents Accumulator D register which comprises the sum of accumulators A and B
CCR This class details the condition code register (CCR)
The CCR defines the state of the processor flags at any given time
DirectPage This class represents the Direct Page register
GraphicalUserInterface Defines a dynamic GUI that displays details of the emulator and contains buttons enabling access to the required functionality.
HardwareStackPointer This class defines the Hardware Stack Pointer
IndexX This class defines the Index X register, used in indexed mode addressing
IndexY This class represents the Y index register
Main This is the main class of an emulator for the Motorola MC6809 microprocessor
This class contains the main method which launches the graphical user interface, giving user access to the program functions
MemoryHandling This class maintains a list representing the 65536 memory locations and provides methods to access and manipulate them along with a routine for handling each operation code
ProgramCounter This class represents the program counter
S_Record This class handles loading and saving of Motorola S-Record files which take the following format

+-------------------//------------------//-----------------------+
| Type | Count | Address | ----- Data ---- | Checksum |
+-------------------//------------------//-----------------------+

The Type field contains two characters which describe the type of record, i.e.
UserGuide This class contains the user guide for the emulator
UserStackPointer This class defines the User Stack Pointer register which contains the address that points to the top of a push-down, pop-up stack
